body_html:
@vishwakftw Do you know why I would be getting a test failure for one of the TransformedDistribution examples in test_cdf_log_prob after merging in master…? It looks like a sign is off somehow. I don't think I should have touched anything that affects this test.

======================================================================
FAIL: test_cdf_log_prob (__main__.TestDistributions)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_distributions.py", line 1325, in test_cdf_log_prob
    'grad(cdf) = {}'.format(cdfs_derivative),
  File "/Users/brookspaige/Documents/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 233, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/Users/brookspaige/Documents/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 225, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: TransformedDistribution example 3/3, d(cdf)/dx != pdf(x)
x = Variable containing:
 0.1667  0.2383  0.1121
 0.2098  0.2094  0.1962
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

cdf = Variable containing:
 0.9476  0.0065  0.7071
 0.0285  0.7694  0.1535
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

pdf = Variable containing:
 6.9085  0.7263  2.6612
 0.5197  2.3816  2.2812
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

grad(cdf) = Variable containing:
-6.9085 -0.7263 -2.6612
-0.5197 -2.3816 -2.2812
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

body:
@vishwakftw Do you know why I would be getting a test failure for one of the `TransformedDistribution` examples in `test_cdf_log_prob` after merging in master…? It looks like a sign is off somehow. I don't think I should have touched anything that affects this test.

```
======================================================================
FAIL: test_cdf_log_prob (__main__.TestDistributions)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_distributions.py", line 1325, in test_cdf_log_prob
    'grad(cdf) = {}'.format(cdfs_derivative),
  File "/Users/brookspaige/Documents/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 233, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/Users/brookspaige/Documents/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 225, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: TransformedDistribution example 3/3, d(cdf)/dx != pdf(x)
x = Variable containing:
 0.1667  0.2383  0.1121
 0.2098  0.2094  0.1962
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

cdf = Variable containing:
 0.9476  0.0065  0.7071
 0.0285  0.7694  0.1535
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

pdf = Variable containing:
 6.9085  0.7263  2.6612
 0.5197  2.3816  2.2812
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]

grad(cdf) = Variable containing:
-6.9085 -0.7263 -2.6612
-0.5197 -2.3816 -2.2812
[torch.DoubleTensor of size (2,3)]
```
